description: It’s time to strap on your kite shield, call up your mercenaries and unfurl the papal banner – there’s a half-wild land over the sea and only The Bastard can tame it! We’re moving from the 13th to the 11th century with the Footsore Miniatures expansion to The Barons’ War – Conquest. Before diving in, […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: The Barons’ War Conquest Review

description: For the last several years, JoyToy has been systematically taking every single Space Marine model that Games Workshop makes, rendering it in 1/18th scale, and selling them with top quality paint jobs.  They started off with a few random Ultramarines, and now you can run a 2000 point army of Ultras.  They have done many […]
title: JoyToy x Warhammer 40K: Review of the Primarchs

description: We take a look at the most common base sizes in 40k and talk about how their size impacts disembarking and charges.
title: Hammer of Math: Base Geometry

description: I love Infinity. I played multiple games of Infinity every week throughout the entire period of N3. When N4 was announced I was excited; new editions are times of change and renewal, and I was looking forwards to seeing how this would shake up a game that had started to feel increasingly solved. Reinforcements was […]
title: Infinity Opinions: Why I Am Glad N4 Is Over

description: It’s probably going to be October when this article goes up.  Sue me. [Oh ye of little faith. -Ed.] Whatever month it is, it’s That Time Of Year Again!  Things have been pretty good in Malifaux since the last errata – Ashes landed with a splash, but the good kind that gets you pleasantly soaked on […]
title: Malifaux September 2024 Erratastravaganza!

description: In a new feature for Goonhammer’s Kings of War coverage, Stephanie Bee reviews lists from Clash of Kings 2024, the largest Kings of War event ever (so far!).
title: Competitive Innovations in Pannithor #0: Clash! A-ah!

description: Goonhammer Kill Team contributer HappyRaccoon made an appearance on Play on Tabletop this week! Join him and Tau Nick as they play through the contents of Hive Storm! Have any questions or feedback? Drop us a note in the comments below or email us at contact@goonhammer.com. Want articles like this linked in your inbox every […]
title: JAKTP Plays Hivestorm at Play On Tabletop!
